website_summaries.verdict: A popular concealer that has been a favorite for decades, as it works as promised by providing reliable coverage for everything from dark circles to scars.
pros: Blendable, buildable coverage that can range from medium to full, depending on users' needs
A little goes a long way for most, and a tube lasts a fairly long time for typical applications
cons: Has been known to settle in creases, especially if not blended completely

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, used with foundation over. Not a complete disguise, although with more time maybe, but now I can go out in public. After and before I
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Not the same coverage and stayability as the old product.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this is not the same product, I have used in the past. As a professional makeup artist, I covered everything from port wine birthmarks, to tattos, and bruising after cosmetic surgery. This product does not have the pigment weight and is too creamy to stay in place. The original was solid, thick to the point of being stiff, and when used properly would cover, and stay on the whole day. This product does not come close to performing like the old did. Even with the powder, it fades away in an hour or so. You can get that type of coverage at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Cre8ivesteph

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing I think they changed their formula My previous dermablend concealer was very thick and it only took a little bit of it to cover my dark spot...i have a birth mark never my left eye that looks like a black and blue spot. Basically looks like i got punched in the eye. This new formula is as thick as it used to be therefore it takes a few layers to cover. So sad It was a miracle product and now its just like any average concealer at the drugstore
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different concealers at the same time to compare them. This concealer was $26. I also ordered NYX concealer that comes in a small jar for under $5.00. It had great reviews. The cheaper concealer is much nicer and I will reorder it. I need good coverage due to dark circles and the cheaper concealer is just much better at covering and matches my skin tone better. This concealer is NOT WORTH the high price. I also use Clinique concealer which is also very good and it is cheaper than this concealer. I am always trying to find better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is an authentic Dermablend product. The packaging, color, and texture are different from the authentic product (pictured on the right of each photo). The packaging is missing the trademark “D” on the cap, and the product info is labeled differently. The color was specified as 35w, but the product I received is “tawny” and not “tan.” Unfortunately, I didn’t realize any of this until I applied the product and now cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years for the dark skin area under my eyes and it covers quite will. I use an eye cream first and then apply the concealer. It doesn't cake in any creases like some from cosmetic companies. There is also a Dermablend powder that can be lightly brushed on the undereye area over the concealer and it helps the concealer stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Hulagirl72

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover or match skin. NON RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover my spots nor match my skin tone. And when I attempted a return, it’s not eligible. Wasted money. I have light olive skin & bought medium 35c.
customer_reviews.author: erica campbell

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and Did Not Work as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect for my skin, but the product is not the same that was sold years ago. Supposed to last 16 hours... disappeared in 15 minutes. Reapplied, same results. Hardly concealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this concealer, it does nothing. I bought it to cover under eye shadows and it did absolutely nothing. I tried it and aside from very poor coverage, within a couple of hours it looked like I didn't put anything on at all. Will be returning. After spending $26 on concealer I would expect it to do as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Wow buy this now!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: The best product you’ll ever find for coverage, I’m encouraging all ladies to buy this and keep it in your “Buy Again” section of your Amazon orders. There are several choices of shades, the texture is creamy and not heavy at all. There are days that I don’t want to use the Dermablend makeup so Imuse the cover stick and apply a little blush instead. I feel confident and pretty all day. At 74, I have deep wrinkles across my cheeks and this product works. I’ll never be without this in my makeup bag . Be beautiful and be blessed❤️❤️❤️🙏🙏🙏
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hogan

customer_reviews.title: It may be ok if you’re age 15-25, not good for older skin.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t order this if you are over 30 years old. I’m 42 and it sunk into every fine line I never even knew I had. Obviously I knew it was going to be thick but it was SO thick making it very hard to spread.
customer_reviews.author: tpstan77

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but haven’t given up yet.
customer_reviews.text: I remember when dermablend was super great at coverage and not much was needed to cover marks or tattoos. This product along with the setting powder works good but I no longer consider it “great”. Perhaps what I purchased was for stage before and if that’s the case I’d like to find that type of coverage again. I’ve had to use multiple strokes across the same area with this concealer stick just to cover anything not to mention blend in and then use the setting powder. Too much work! I want flawless easy mega coverage and this was my last go to. I don’t know what else to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sphinx

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, But Worth It...
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this a try, since the brand I had been using (Fashion Fair) has apparently gone out of business - The coverage is perfect, it lasts all day, and my oily breakouts are minimum - Which is HUGE to me, because I always ended up having to blot several times throughout the day - The shade is just about right, but I've always experienced difficulty finding an "exact match" makeup for my uneven skin tone - While the tube is small, I'm finding that I don't have to use a lot each time I apply it, but I'm willing to pay more money for a product that I'm 90% pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Lavern B.

customer_reviews.title: Fake product?
customer_reviews.text: Either this is a fake product or Dermablend changed and downgraded their packaging and product. The product I received was much smaller than advertised and in completely different packaging than the last Dermablend concealer I bought from the store. What I received is very oily, moves around on the skin, doesn’t set, and oxidized about 4 shades darker very quickly. I would avoid purchasing this if you’re a fan of actual Dermablend products...because this ain’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can wear this product.
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars not because it is the best concealer or value, yet those of us with multi-contact allergies are grateful for a decent product and this concealer is just fine. I find it best to use a moisturizer on the face or the product will look chalky. I can only tolerate petroleum and Vaseline is too heavy but eltaMD pure petroleum is highly refined and I use it lightly on face. My age spots and imperfections are covered and then I top with a face powder that is safe for me. Nice smooth appearance on a 71 year old face.
customer_reviews.author: GardeningJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a scar. It didn't cover it at all. Then I decided to use it to cover some spots on my face. It covered those because they were very light, but then it gave me terrible acne which I don't generally have. Would not buy again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lainey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend your money on this buy Glo Minerals Concealer
customer_reviews.text: It was a terrible product and the return window was way too soon amazon needs to go back to old return window otherwise what’s the perk in amazon prime?!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Turbes

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered online and the product I got was a shade too light, but I apply the concealer before I put on foundation and it all blends in and looks great. This is not cheap as far as concealers go but it does the job better than any others. We've been trying to find the perfect one for years and this one was featured in an article on The Cut and that's why the price shot up. I'm happy with it at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not the results  I wanted
customer_reviews.text: No matter what kind of concealer I use, I can't quite cover this red blotch on my cheek. It's not raised, not a blemish or a scar. Smooth. And red. I have dozens of name brand concealers, stick & liquids. But when I look in the mirror, i'ts all I see. Dermablend (used in the [past) doesn't do much either. Nothing does.
customer_reviews.author: thekadydidkloset0197

customer_reviews.title: Dry and chalky
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews, I expected so much more. I'll give it three stars for covering light redness, but it did not conceal dark under eye circles well at all. It was dry & chalky, and creased like crazy. I tried using primer, adding a little lotion, mixing with my regular foundation, and applying with a concealer brush and by patting with my finger, but nothing worked. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pelicanlake71

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this concealer! Admittedly I have only ever tried one other concealer, but this is amazing. I have significant acne scarring on my nose and almost always have a cystic pimple or two that needs to be covered and this works flawlessly. I applied under foundation and my husband even noticed how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this Dermablend product for years. The one I received is definitely not the same coverage as previous purchases made at cosmetic counters. When comparing the product to my current one, I noticed that the Dermablend D was missing from the cap. Either Dermablend changed their product and packaging or this is not the true product. I will stay with purchasing my cosmetic products in store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: It matches well for under my eyes. Was in a car accident & have permanent dark damage under one eye. Covers it nicely. Lasts pretty long and covers up scars. After some skin cancer surgery the Dr. recommended this to help cover the scars which it does. Very creamy! Does not last if it gets wet however. Need to reapply if you cry or your eyes tear from allergies
customer_reviews.author: Papersky

customer_reviews.title: Not the old Dermablend I remember
customer_reviews.text: This did not work like the Dermablend I used to buy from beauty supply. It was waxy and cheap, did not provide coverage and worst of all wiped right off like greasepaint. A total waste of money. Felt like a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: bakibaki

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last very long either both with wear and I went through the tube in like a month
customer_reviews.text: So I definitely think you should save your money on this one. It covered and it did match my fair complexion. However, It moved around too much on my face, made me shiny, and felt heavy and uncomfortable. It didn't last very long either both with wear and I went through the tube in like a month!!! Not enough product to justify my $21.85 purchase. I'm going to save my money for the Nars radiant concealer. Will probably be 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble finding this product in color I wanted. My last tube was usable for many, many years. Even though the cost was a bit high, the quality is good and the fact that it last so long, helps. Product has staying power without the powder recommended. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: NancyJ

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what coverage your looking for....
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product is VERY over priced. Being that the coverage is not as full as expected. Also the setting time is long. I basically apply walk around the house then continue makeup application. If it were more affordable would recommend to purchase. Find coverage like this can be found elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: not the same
customer_reviews.text: the new ones that on coming out and not the same as the older version. The new ones a lot more creamy and do not stay on as long. It sure looks like you changed the formula to me as I am not the only one that thinks this. The new ones do not a a D on the top which sends a red flag to me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Blends Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff! Blends very well, I was honestly very surprised how much red it was able to cover. I have a relentless break out on my left cheek and I have been trying everything to heal it. At least in the meantime I can pretend its not there. You can blend by hand or with a sponge which is what I prefer. Obviously the texture of the breakout is still visible but its next to nothing compared to what it looked like prior. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: as far as price its very reasonable and does the job...not to thick so it applies easier than some of the others I have tried. and color match is pretty good I bought the medium light and I may order the medium next time but I would recommend this product and i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: parakeet

customer_reviews.title: didn't cover anything
customer_reviews.text: Terrible coverage! So very disappointed after reading good reviews. This didn't even cover my tattoo, much less hide it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Did i miss a better "color" chart
customer_reviews.text: Hard to match basic colors shown to my skin tone. I chose beige. It has a yellow undertone. My coloring is beige with a "blue" (cool) undertone. I have dark almost black hair. I have used dermablend before (about 20yrs ago) and i know there were many shades to match my skin color in the "warm/cool" tones. Did i miss a better "color" chart ? If not i wouldn't order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lees cats

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Need to cover a tattoo on my arm for work. I was worried that the color would not match my very brown skin but the deep was perfect. It went on very easy; a little goes a long way. I used the pressed setting powder to set. I wear white shirts and there was very little transfer. The key is less is more!
customer_reviews.author: Gymfly

customer_reviews.title: I use it as an under eye concealer and LOVE IT. I thought it would stay kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an under eye concealer and LOVE IT. I thought it would stay kind of creamy and oily after application, but it really doesn't. I apply it, do my eye makeup, blend it again, and I'm done for the day. No collecting in my little wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: If you want a concealer that stays on, this is it. It can be a little thick, which is desirable in some cases. If I do not want it that way (around my eyes), I dab some on my finger and then blend using my regular face or eye cream. Unless you rub, rub, rub this off, it's staying on. I have been using this product for years and still stand by it. The price at Amazon was better than any retailers around me, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Leigh

customer_reviews.title: You will be more than happy you purchased this product.
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend Quick Fix Concealer is the best concealer ever. You only need to apply a tiny bit It covers quickly and last all day. The concealer last a long time even though it’s a little higher In price you will find it’s well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Cook

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but worth this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: 🧚‍♀️ l would NEVER want to have to live without Dermablend. Dermablend is a high quality product and the many people who use it attests to its quality. My health is poor and it shows in my skin. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yavapai

customer_reviews.title: Takes years off your appearance
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived very quickly. I turned 40this year and I'm starting to see some sun spots and some dark circles under my eyes. This product is amazing. It completely covers without settling into fine lines and wrinkles. I also used it to cover sun spots on my legs and arms. It stays on all day without touch up. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed for maturing scars!
customer_reviews.text: Not only for birthmarks, but also for maturing scars on the face. A scar taken a year or two to mature, and if exposed to sun, it goes weird. Tried it on an older man's face after Efudex burn and it was too noticeable, so we went to a tinted sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: I order one thing and got another not happy at all I bought this to cover my vitiligo ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to light. It’s not coffe colored it’s more caucasian. I order one thing and got another not happy at all I bought this to cover my vitiligo on my face and it’s the same color or the vitiligo witch white.
customer_reviews.author: jovani mercado

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older adult with lots of blimps to cover - this product is wonderful. I have tried other products with no satisfaction. I AM LOVE WITH THIS!! I will be ordering more products from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: First off this package came in an envelope so when I opened it the box was crushed. The makeup was smeared on the inside of the cap and their color matching system was completely off. The product is way too heavy leaves creases and it only lasts on your face for about an hour. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Dermablend Quick FIX
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product looking for something that would cover blemishes completely and easily. This product has completely satisfied my needs and I recently reordered the same product. I also use Dermablend Coverblend for larger areas and find the two products work well together. I only apply this makeup once a day (except in rare occasions) and love the way it applies so easily. The one important thing about this product is determining the right color that matches your skin color. I have had no problem with allergic reactions to Dermablend. I use a moisturizer first and it makes the applications smoother. I will continue to use these products. This product is affordable and effective and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: THE MUSIC LADY

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is amazing! If there are comments that it did not cover properly then it is not being applied properly or color choice was incorrect. Everyone I tell about it purchases it and I have had all positive feedback. I even have a friend who uses this and another dermablend product to cover age spots, scars etc and it has changed her life. She used to hide from those issues and roacia (I think I spelled wrong) anyway, love this and I was excited to find Amazon carrying it because when I would go to Macys to purchase most of the time my color was sold out ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At $26.00, this item is way overpriced. I could have bought a drugstore brand at half the cost, but I thought the Dermablend brand name would denote superior coverage and overall quality. It didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie MacPherson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Use this product to cover hypopigmantation on my skin Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Moro

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love the product... However, the delivery driver set package in the hot son and the concealer melted. Overall when product is firm it matches my skin perfectly and covers all my dark marks
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Under eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: I use this as under eye concealer. To make yourself look fresh and without bags, you need a lighter than normal skin color concealer under your eyes. This is my favorite under eye concealer, it lasts for a long time and makes my tired eyes/bags really look like they have gone away when I apply my make up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I like this stick for the occasional blemish or redness. I apply it with a small flat brush and it gives great coverage. I've used it on my face and chest with small break-outs, and it stays put all day and doesn't make my skin dry or flaky.
customer_reviews.author: GirlinLA

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit in a tube.  Gone before you know it
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for so little. Inconsistent color specsifications. Match your colors to other like products. Is it cold tone, warm tone,? color name or number
customer_reviews.author: Customer since 1918

customer_reviews.title: A bit watery
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease and tackiness, but Clé de Peau is the best product out there. This one is a bit watery and seems to come off easier, plus it is more translucent and not as good of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: naplesinsider

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my Murad concealer stick (discontinued), and this wasn't equivalent. The concealer goes on smooth and stays put all day long. It does cover imperfections, but it's more along the lines of a foundation stick than a concealer. It's good, just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: 👑HerRoyalHIGHness👑

customer_reviews.title: Too chunky
customer_reviews.text: It's way to thick and chunky for my face. I tried to use a very small eye/lip brush, but that didn't help. It may be used on a different part of the body. I'll need something thinner to spread better, so it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Covers scars
customer_reviews.text: I like that it only takes a small amount which goes on smoothly and fills any small gaps left by a scar. Also protects the scar from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: The Best I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the Quick Concealer because it is less expensive. It is also easier to apply. I have scarred legs and they appear like Leopard spots. Needless to say, I don't like to wear anything but long pants. However, spring/summer is here and unless I want to swim in a wet suit, I needed something to cover these bad scars. The concealer is not invisible but it does the job well enough that I will venture out in public unpanted so to speak. You might want to try this first and then graduate to the heavier cream if you are satisfied it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Wendling

customer_reviews.title: full coverage concealer
customer_reviews.text: I received the concealer today and it was a little damaged - perhaps melted a little. I tried it and it's very oily. The shade I ordered was a little light but using a blending sponge I was able to work it in. I'll probably keep it but keep in mind that any type of powder type foundation you use over it or just regular powder it'll stick and look heavy. Use as little as possible to minimize the cakey look.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good work covering acne scars
customer_reviews.text: It helped cover my dark acne scars so it works, however its quite thick so it feels like a mask in the skin, and you probably want to hydrate skin first then feels ok
customer_reviews.author: Surya

customer_reviews.title: Average Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Dermablend from years past. It is a good basic concealer, smooth, light, but really doesn't cover scars or brownspots.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all day at my best friends outdoor wedding! This photos is after 8 hours being outside!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER makeup to hide any imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Its very dense, but melts into skin hiding whatever imprecation, scar etc. you want to. Old formula had spa 50 - this does not.
customer_reviews.author: cynna

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I expected and doesn't really solve my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I expected and doesn't really solve my problem. It's a very small amount for the price charged as well. I can't really say what problem it might address with success and I wouldn't order it again but would try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: The new packaging also changed the color. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The new packaging also changed the color. I have used "deep" for over 10 years. Now its 4 shades darker than my skin. Why did they change to color and keep the name? Not to mention its more expensive and the new packing offers less of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cover up a few facial blemishes. This did job beautifully. Easy to smooth on and cover with powder. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lanie

customer_reviews.title: The product inside the tube had been marred.
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend is the best cover-up in my opinion. The one I received looked like someone had take the lid off and didn't put it back correctly so the inside produce was marred. I only kept it because I was completely out of cover-up and did not have time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Catino

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfectly fine product. I honestly don't see any benefits of ...
customer_reviews.text: After hearing about these Dermablend products for years, I finally bought the concealer. It is a perfectly fine product. I honestly don't see any benefits of this over the drugstore brands for a third the price...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO, NO, NO
customer_reviews.text: Puts pores on display. The concealer settles into scars and pores. It makes imperfections show up more than if you were makeup free. Dries crusty and flaky. Worse concealer I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works good but super thick you only need a little at at time. Coverage is definitely good! Make sure your face is scrubbed well and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Saroniero

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Can break up a bit under a mask so use a setting spray. Good coverage though over anything.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous One

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: High quality -- best concealer I have ever used. Covers dark circles, lasts all day. Worked well for covering a small scar on my arm too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Durina

customer_reviews.title: My go-to concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to concealer! It is creamy and covers better than anything else I've tried. This is my third Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I was gesturing at first because it’s a little pricey but it works like a charm. Very easy to blend and makes your skin look flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Oil based?
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend is great but as this is oil based it wont last long. Read ingredients prior to purchase. I bought this because I thought it was long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: DOLLY2019

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! I've tried most of the brands out there, but this is the most consistent one at hiding redness and blemishes. I took one star off because it is a bit pricy and I've never found anything that changes the texture of a blemish. This saved my life on an important photo day so I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Some coverup
customer_reviews.text: Put this on this on to hide only minor imperfections. It glides and blends smoothly. Was hoping it would hide some acne scars but it didn’t. Need to put powder on top for matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, older skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is super sensitive and dry. I love this product as it goes on smoothly and blends easily. Have bought it several times.
customer_reviews.author: mobwriter

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 'go to' cover up for dark under eye circle. I try other ones, but always come back to this one!
customer_reviews.author: N. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product. I have minor scaring and under eye shadows and this covered everything right up. As a 24 year old, I hate when my face can show darkspots and such. This product was easy to apply, light on my skin, covered up what I needed and most importantly, it stayed on throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Very good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This covered up about 90% of bruising I had from dental surgery. Needs to built up, layer after layer, and then I apply foundation and powder. Definitely looks like you are wearing makeup, but that's better than ugly bruises. Beige is sort of a natural ocher, and easily blends into my light/medium complexion, even though it is a bit darker than my foundation. Covers red completely, purplish is toned down enough, but a shadow of it peeps through.
customer_reviews.author: Betty37

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it covers blemishes....but....
customer_reviews.text: Covers great, doesn't cause blemishes, but, I find this version of the product dries out very quickly. Never had this issue in the small, lidded, containers. It is probably because of the lipstick style container.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: This is great for dark circles!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with dark eye circles although I am a fair person - this concealor has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... set with a translucent powder and you've got near perfect coverage for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Applied over a primer then set with a translucent powder and you've got near perfect coverage for dark circles. You could wipe out the dark circles but then you're heading into heavy eye make-up territory that looks caked on. I am a light/medium skinned Puerto Rican woman with an Olive tome complexion and red/dark circles under my eyes and this has been the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyett-Romano

customer_reviews.title: A Little Goes a Long Way
customer_reviews.text: Learned that at 48 I shouldn’t gob it on my face anymore as it causes visible creases. I love it now that I use a little and a little goes a long way! Very rich.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great coverage that lasts
customer_reviews.text: great coverage that lasts! I was nervous when this product changed format from the prior pan-style that I'd used for so many years, but it's the same item, just in an easier to carry tube. I have a port wine birthmark that's right on my cheek and have been using this product ever since my mom took me to the makeup counter in high school (I'm now 37) and it provides perfect coverage. It stays put through sports, swimming, a day at the beach, a long day of work followed by a night out. I also use it to cover up blemishes and it works perfect for that too.
customer_reviews.author: NYC123

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Long lasting wear even with a mask on most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mcwhorter

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. It is the only concealer that I have found that hasn’t broken me out. My only complaint is I have fair skin and wish they made a lighter shade to match my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff...but was looking for slightly better coverage...finally upped to Stage Make up....but still use this under eyes in combination with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Night

customer_reviews.title: Just another concealer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover-up some facial bruising. I even paid extra to get next day shipping, to only be disappointed. It worked ok, but didn't cover any better than the BB cream I was using before this arrived. I guess I was expecting more for the high price. It's creamy, but went on clunky and thick. It did not give me the full-coverage natural look that the other reviewers and product claimed.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not cover my (light) under eye circles, just doesn't contain enough color pigment. It is creamy, I liked that hence the two stars. I'm 59 years old with normal (not oily nor dry), fair skin that is in very good condition. See image of my face/skin as compared with my 30 year old daughters face/skin. Photo taken March 12, 2015 while on a Disney cruise.
customer_reviews.author: kitsaplady

customer_reviews.title: Dermablend is the best for coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very full coverage, love it. Dermablend is the best for coverage& i’ve tried them all. Fairly blendable too so it doesn’t look pasty or thick.

customer_reviews.title: Got bruises?
customer_reviews.text: Brown marks? This stuff is the BEST! It hides em...just be sure to get the right color for you.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Newly diagnosed with rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coverup for the occasional rosacea outbreak. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaO

customer_reviews.title: It does the jib
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a shadow under my eyes. It’s not just a concealer, I use it for circles, but I wanted more coverage for this small area. I have great skin, and I need nothing special for it. The eye thing drives me nuts. I have also tried stage makeup just for 2 dots. This is the best...needs to be creamy, not greasy. Astonishing Concealer is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Dallas Blackston

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. It covers very well. I put it on with a makeup sponge before applying mineral powder - absolutley love it! It covers light blemishes and large pores. My skin does not break out but I have fairly large pores- which it covers.
customer_reviews.author: SRB

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get an accurate color match with limited choices...
customer_reviews.text: Color was not he best match for using on my legs..for spider veins.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieLou

customer_reviews.title: Blends easily
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for my skin tone. Covers brown spots. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Lovely coverage that isn’t cakey
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! I’m very fair with neutral/yellow undertone skin. The 10n is a nice match for my skin. I use it under my eyes, and I love how long wearing it is. It does not settle into fine lines. I recommended it to my sister and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: decent coverage but not pancake feel like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've used dermablend in the past but this seems a bit different than what I remember. not as much coverage but lighter in feel. Not pancake like it used to be. So good and bad there. Will use this tube and probably not reorder this specific concealer, go back to foundation like I had before. Still worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Mack

customer_reviews.title: A trusted old friend
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Dermablend for many years and just recently purchased it from Amazon. You can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Dermablend is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love Dermablend Quick Fix Concealer. I am going to order again because this item offers great coverage! I have received comments that my makeup looks beautiful thanks to Dermablend!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Light and airy.. so far so good.. very pleased.. wish it was a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Chunky monkey

product_meta.title: Dermablend Quick-Fix Full Coverage Concealer, Concealer Makeup Stick for Dark Circles & Imperfections
product_meta.description:
Color:35c Medium

Amazon is an authorized retailer of Dermablend Products.

Quick Fix Concealer is the #1 clinical concealer stick. Our ultimate full coverage concealer makeup formulated for all skin types including the most sensitive skin. Super saturated concealer stick with high-performance pigments. The creamy texture is never cakey or mask-like. Concealer glides on smoothly to act as a blemishes and acne scar concealer, dark circles concealer and under eye concealer. Does not enhance the look of lines, wrinkles or pores. Skin feels comfortable and looks naturally flawless. Provides maximum cover for up to 16 hours of consistent smudge - and transfer-resistant color wear - when set with Dermablend Setting Powder.

 * Dermatologist-tested
 * Fragrance-free
 * Allergy-tested
 * Sensitive skin tested
 * Non-comedogenic
 * Non-acnegenic

Usage: Glide over desired area. Use finger, brush or sponge to blend and smooth. For 16 hours of wear, apply setting powder and leave on for 2 minutes; buff off. Inactive ingredients: mineral oil, talc, beeswax, isopropyl palmitate, stearyl stearate, kaolin, magnesium carbonate, copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax, allantoin, microcrystalline. Formulated without phthalates, triclosan and sodium lauryl sulfate and paraben free

Product packaging may vary.

*Source: The NPD Group/ U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Makeup Sales, January-September 2018



BRAND STORY
Dermablend is powerful makeup for all; high-performance pigments available in a wide shade range. A dermatologist created brand with high safety standards: fragrance-free, allergy-tested, sensitive skin tested, non-comedogenic.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
